title: What Next TBD: The Chaos That Made YouTube a Juggernaut
description:
An inside look at the rise of YouTube into a social media behemoth.
Guests: Mark Bergen and Claire Stapleton
Host: Lizzie O'Leary
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: How the company has struggled with creators, extremism, and itself.
